```{r}
my_quantiles <- seq(1, 10, by = 1)
my_bs <- dnorm(x = my_quantiles, mean = 5, sd = 1)
plot( x = my_quantiles, y = my_bs, type = 'b', lwd = 4)
```



```{r}
my_quantiles <- seq(1, 20, by = 1)
my_ds <- dbinom(x = my_quantiles, size = max(my_quantiles), prob = 0.25)
#my_bs <- pbinom(q = my_quantiles, size = max(my_quantiles), prob = 0.5, lower.tail = TRUE, log.p = FALSE)
plot( x = my_quantiles, y = my_ds, type = 'h', lwd = 4)
```
